[{"id":"143","id_user":"1","id_parent":"0","tenbaiviet_vi":"KHU NGH\u1ec8 D\u01af\u1ee0NG NOVAWORLD H\u1ed2 TR\u00c0M","tenbaiviet_en":"","tenbaiviet_cn":null,"tenbaiviet_jp":null,"mota_vi":"","mota_en":"","mota_cn":null,"mota_jp":null,"noidung_vi":"<p>Novaworld H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m thu\u1ed9c qu\u1ea7n th\u1ec3 gi\u1ea3i tr&iacute; ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng \u0111\u1eb3ng c\u1ea5p do Novaland Group ph&aacute;t tri\u1ec3n, \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c ra m\u1eaft song song c&ugrave;ng v\u1edbi d\u1ef1 &aacute;n nh&agrave; ph\u1ed1 Aqua City &amp; Novaworld Phan Thi\u1ebft t\u1ea1i B&igrave;nh Thu\u1eadn.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>\u0110&acirc;y l&agrave; d\u1ef1 &aacute;n n\u1eb1m trong chu\u1ed7i chi\u1ebfn l\u01b0\u1ee3c l\u1ea5n s&acirc;u v&agrave;o ph&acirc;n kh&uacute;c ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng c\u1ee7a Novaland t\u1ea1i c&aacute;c th\u1ecb tr\u01b0\u1eddng m\u1edbi, v\u1edbi s\u1ef1 kh&aacute;c bi\u1ec7t thu\u1ed9c v\u1ec1 quy m&ocirc; si&ecirc;u kh\u1ee7ng v&agrave; s\u1ed1 l\u01b0\u1ee3ng ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch l&ecirc;n \u0111\u1ebfn 1000 h\u1ea1ng m\u1ee5c tr\u1ea3i d&agrave;i theo cung \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng ven bi\u1ec3n t\u1eeb L\u1ed9c An \u0111\u1ebfn B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p><a href=\"https:\/\/aquacityvn.vn\/novaworld-ho-tram\/\">NovaWorld H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m<\/a>&nbsp;l&agrave; t\u1ed5 h\u1ee3p Du l\u1ecbch Ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng Gi\u1ea3i tr&iacute; quy m&ocirc; t\u1edbi 1.000 ha, v\u1edbi \u0111a d\u1ea1ng phong c&aacute;ch ki\u1ebfn tr&uacute;c c&ugrave;ng h\u1ec7 sinh th&aacute;i ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch phong ph&uacute;, mang \u0111\u1ebfn tr\u1ea3i nghi\u1ec7m \u0111\u1eb7c s\u1eafc v&agrave; cao c\u1ea5p cho nhi\u1ec1u nh&oacute;m kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>D\u1ef1 &aacute;n NovaWorld H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m c\u0169ng li\u1ec1n k\u1ec1 nhi\u1ec1u d\u1ecbch v\u1ee5 du l\u1ecbch \u0111\u1ed9c \u0111&aacute;o nh\u01b0 Su\u1ed1i kho&aacute;ng n&oacute;ng B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u, Khu b\u1ea3o t\u1ed3n B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u Ph\u01b0\u1edbc B\u1eedu, s&acirc;n Golf thu\u1ed9c h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1eb9p nh\u1ea5t th\u1ebf gi\u1edbi&hellip;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"487\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/6(2).jpg\" width=\"650\" \/>\r\n<figcaption><\/figcaption>\r\n<\/figure>\r\n\r\n<h2>V\u1eca TR&Iacute; D\u1ef0 &Aacute;N<\/h2>\r\n\r\n<p>&nbsp;<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>V\u1ecb tr&iacute; l&agrave; m\u1ed9t trong nh\u1eefng \u0111i\u1ec1u quan tr\u1ecdng \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c nhi\u1ec1u kh&aacute;ch h&agrave;ng quan t&acirc;m h&agrave;ng \u0111\u1ea7u khi t&igrave;m hi\u1ec3u v\u1ec1 c&aacute;c d\u1ef1 &aacute;n b\u1ea5t \u0111\u1ed9ng s\u1ea3n, v&agrave; Novaworld B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u \u0111&atilde; l&agrave;m r\u1ea5t t\u1ed1t \u0111i\u1ec1u n&agrave;y khi 4 ph&iacute;a l\u1ea7n l\u01b0\u1ee3t gi&aacute;p v\u1edbi khi d&acirc;n c\u01b0 (ph&iacute;a \u0110&ocirc;ng B\u1eafc), tr\u1ee5c \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng Nguy\u1ec5n V\u0103n C\u1eeb (ph&iacute;a \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam), r\u1ea1ch Th\u1ee7 L\u1ef1u (ph&iacute;a T&acirc;y Nam) v&agrave; \u0111\u1ea5t tr\u1ed1ng (ph&iacute;a T&acirc;y B\u1eafc) \u0111em \u0111\u1ebfn nhi\u1ec1u gi&aacute; tr\u1ecb v\u1ec1 vi\u1ec7c di chuy\u1ec3n, \u0111i l\u1ea1i cho c\u01b0 d&acirc;n.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>Ngo&agrave;i ra,<strong>&nbsp;v\u1ecb tr&iacute; c\u1ee7a d\u1ef1 &aacute;n Novaworld H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u&nbsp;<\/strong>c&ograve;n l&agrave; trung t&acirc;m k\u1ebft n\u1ed1i&nbsp;\u0111\u1ebfn&nbsp;c&aacute;c c\u1ee5m Du L\u1ecbch n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng c\u1ee7a t\u1ec9nh&nbsp;B&agrave; R\u1ecba-V\u0169ng T&agrave;u nh\u01b0 c\u1ee5m du l\u1ecbch Long H\u1ea3i-Ph\u01b0\u1edbc H\u1ea3i, c\u1ee5m du l\u1ecbch H\u1ed3 C\u1ed1c &ndash; H\u1ed3 Tr&agrave;m, c\u1ee5m du l\u1ecbch B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u-Ph\u01b0\u1edbc B\u1eedu hay c&aacute;ch \u0111\u1ecba \u0111i\u1ec3m du l\u1ecbch n\u1ed5i ti\u1ebfng nh\u01b0 bi\u1ec3n Long H\u1ea3i, \u0111\u1ea3o Long S\u01a1n (c&aacute;ch 10-12 km), su\u1ed1i n\u01b0\u1edbc n&oacute;ng - r\u1eebng nguy&ecirc;n sinh B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u (30-40 km) \u0111\u1ec3 t\u1ea1o \u0111i\u1ec1u ki\u1ec7n thu\u1eadn ti\u1ec7n cho nh\u1eefng chuy\u1ebfn \u0111i du l\u1ecbch, ng&agrave;y ngh\u1ec9, x\u1ea3 h\u01a1i cho chu\u1ed7i ng&agrave;y l&agrave;m vi\u1ec7c c\u0103ng th\u1eb3ng, m\u1ec7t m\u1ecfi c&ugrave;ng gia \u0111&igrave;nh, b\u1ea1n b&egrave; v&agrave; ng\u01b0\u1eddi th&acirc;n cho c\u01b0 d&acirc;n n\u01a1i \u0111&acirc;y.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<p>D\u1ef1 &aacute;n n&agrave;y c&agrave;ng tr\u1edf n&ecirc;n &ldquo;\u0111\u1eaft gi&aacute;&rdquo; h\u01a1n khi t\u1ecda l\u1ea1c t\u1ea1i ngay c\u1eeda ng\u1ecf c\u1ee7a khu v\u1ef1c. Ch\u1ec9 c&aacute;ch 700m tuy\u1ebfn Cao t\u1ed1c Bi&ecirc;n H&ograve;a &ndash; V\u0169ng T&agrave;u v&agrave; c&aacute;c tuy\u1ebfn \u0111\u01b0\u1eddng tr\u1ecdng \u0111i\u1ec3m \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c xem l&agrave; h&agrave;nh lang kinh t\u1ebf ch\u1ee7 lchurcuar khu v\u1ef1c \u0110&ocirc;ng Nam B\u1ed9 nh\u01b0 qu\u1ed1c l\u1ed9 51, 55, 56. Sinh s\u1ed1ng t\u1ea1i&nbsp;<strong>Novaworld B&igrave;nh Ch&acirc;u<\/strong>, b\u1ea1n ho&agrave;n to&agrave;n c&oacute; th\u1ec3 d\u1ec5 d&agrave;ng di chuy\u1ec3n \u0111\u1ebfn nhi\u1ec1u ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch ngo\u1ea1i khu nh\u01b0&nbsp;s&acirc;n bay Qu\u1ed1c T\u1ebf Long Th&agrave;nh (40km), th&agrave;nh ph\u1ed1 H\u1ed3 Ch&iacute; Minh&nbsp;(90km) hay resort&nbsp;M\u0169i N&eacute; &ndash; Phan Thi\u1ebft.<\/p>\r\n\r\n<figure class=\"image\"><img alt=\"\" height=\"900\" src=\"\/datafiles\/images\/8.jpg\" width=\"1600\" x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng<\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td>36%<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\u2705 Lo\u1ea1i h&igrave;nh \u0111\u1ea7u t\u01b0<\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td>Bi\u1ec7t th\u1ef1 ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng, nh&agrave; ph\u1ed1, shophouse, c\u0103n h\u1ed9, kh&aacute;ch s\u1ea1n, khu du l\u1ecbch, khu ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\u2705 Quy m&ocirc;<\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td>Kho\u1ea3ng 1000 ha di\u1ec7n t&iacute;ch \u0111\u01b0\u1ee3c quy ho\u1ea1ch theo m&ocirc; h&igrave;nh Khu du l\u1ecbch ngh\u1ec9 d\u01b0\u1ee1ng sinh th&aacute;i \u0111a ch\u1ee9c n\u0103ng (Intergrated Resort), bao g\u1ed3m c&aacute;c s\u1ea3n ph\u1ea9m l\u01b0u tr&uacute; (<strong>100 m2 &ndash; 500 m2\/c\u0103n<\/strong>) v&agrave; c&aacute;c c\u1ee5m ti\u1ec7n &iacute;ch \u0111\u1eb7c s\u1eafc.<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\u2705 Kh\u1edfi c&ocirc;ng x&acirc;y d\u1ef1ng<\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td>N\u0103m 2019<\/td>\r\n\t\t<\/tr>\r\n\t\t<tr>\r\n\t\t\t<td>\u2705 D\u1ef1 ki\u1ebfn b&agrave;n giao<\/td>\r\n\t\t\t<td>N\u0103m
